alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; Owyhee Mountains; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:44PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Ada, Canyon and northwestern Owyhee Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 543 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary producing strong winds near thunderstorms along a line extending from Middleton to near Murphy. Movement was northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Caldwell, Middleton, Star and Huston around 550 PM MDT. Greenleaf and Sand Hollow around 600 PM MDT. Notus, Marsing, Wilder and Elephant Butte around 610 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Treasure Valley; Owyhee Mountains; Upper Treasure Valley
